AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: young racer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was passionate about speed. The desire to race had been in [PAWN_objective] ever since [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fly.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bully flyer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] felt like an outcast, peers considered [PAWN_objective] a loser and mocked. Wanting to gain recognition and respect, as well as create an intimidating reputation, [PAWN_pronoun] began to mock those who were weaker, taking out [PAWN_possessive] resentment and anger on them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lost among clouds
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] got lost in a large group of cumulus clouds. [PAWN_pronoun] wandered among them for a long time, until was finally found and rescued.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: weak-winged
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While other foals of the same age were carelessly frolicking in the clouds, [PAWN_nameDef] could not join them. [PAWN_possessive] own underdeveloped wings did not allow to rise into the air, and this did not give [PAWN_objective] peace of mind. [PAWN_nameDef] was very worried and upset.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cloud catcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found true happiness as soon as learned to fly. [PAWN_pronoun] began to experience an extraordinary passion for clouds, collecting them into bizarre figures and showing them to [PAWN_possessive] friends.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rainbow lover
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] has been in sincere awe of rainy weather. [PAWN_possessive] heart sank with admiration when [PAWN_pronoun] saw the bright rainbow appearing after the rain. [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed it color palette, and the various trinkets made using it caused [PAWN_objective] genuine delight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: born of Shadowbolt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up under the influence of relatives who inspired [PAWN_objective] that there was no one more majestic and sovereign than Nightmoon. [PAWN_pronoun] became a full member of the Shadowbolts and living in complete isolation from the outside world, [PAWN_pronoun] created an ideal for [PAWN_objective]self, which sought to faithfully serve.
